subject: Intro
message: XYZ company is interested in you. To apply please visit angel list

subject: New sign-in from Firefox on Windows
message: Your Google Account xyz@gmail.com was just used to sign in from Firefox on Windows.

subject: Please return my stapler
message: Hey my stapler is missing again. Please return it.

subject: product back in Stock!!!
message: The product in your cart is in Stock now!!. Hurry up and order online now. Also check new exciting offers

subject: Why so serious?
message: I finally saw that movie you were talking about and really liked it! Thanks for the recommendation.

subject: This weekend
message: Hi, are you around this weekend? Want to check out the new coffee shop that opened down the street?
